Authors: Zakirah T., Emeraldi R., Handi O.M., Danil D., Kasih T.P.
Title: Warehouse layout and workflow designing at PT. PMS using systematic layout planning method
Source title: IOP Conference Series: Earth and Environmental Science
Affiliations: Industrial Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Professional Engineer Program Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Zakirah, T., Industrial Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Emeraldi, R., Industrial Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Handi, O.M., Industrial Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Danil, D., Professional Engineer Program Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Kasih, T.P., Professional Engineer Program Department, Faculty of Engineering, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: PT. PMS, a company which has specialization in offshore and onshore services has many equipments to support their service operation. The equipment has been classified into four divisions, Diving, ROV, Cleaning and Painting. The problems observed in PT. PMS warehouse were their disorganized warehouse system which has no fixed layout design. For the purpose of improvement, a new warehouse layout design was proposed in this study to solve the problem. The method of modified Systematic Layout Planning (SLP) has been used to design an efficient warehouse layout. Step by step layout procedure has been done. It consists of Activity Relationship Chart and Activity Relationship Diagram that have been discussed. It is proved from this study that SLP method provides an effective method in layout designing, even in the service company that has many equipments to be stored in an efficient manner. © 2018 Institute of Physics Publishing. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Activity Relationship Chart; Activity Relationship Diagram; Systematic Layout Planning; Warehouse Layout
Index Keywords: Offshore oil well production; Warehouses; Layout designs; Service companies; Service operations; Systematic layout planning; Warehouse layout; Warehouse systems; Design
